verbs.description: as [ARG0: more universities] [V: drop] [ARG1: sat] and act requirements cal state chancellor asks for a closer look cal state chancellor timothy p white said wednesday that he has asked academic leaders to study whether the sat and act tests are viable predictors of student success as more universities drop admission requirements for the test last week the university of california announced a similar study university of chicago los angeles times cal state northridge chancellor white
